record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business for 30 minutes, under the control of the Republican leader or his designee, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.
The Senator from Tennessee is recognized.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, will the Chair let me know when 6 minutes has expired?

record.chair: The Chair will so inform the Senator.
